BackgroundCircles Component Demo

This component displays animated circles that move and change size dynamically. The animation adapts to different screen sizes using responsive breakpoints.

Features

  • Smooth circle animations using requestAnimationFrame
  • Dynamic size changes with smooth transitions
  • Hardcoded color palette for consistent aesthetics
  • Responsive behavior across mobile, tablet, and desktop
  • Automatic canvas resizing on window resize
  • Optimized performance for various screen sizes

Responsive Configuration

Mobile (< 640px): 15 circles, 20-50px radius, 0.3x speed

Tablet (640px - 1023px): 25 circles, 30-70px radius, 0.5x speed

Desktop (≥ 1024px): 35 circles, 40-100px radius, 0.7x speed

); }

**Desktop** (≥1024px): 35 circles, 40-100px radius, 0.7x speed - **Auto-Resize**: Adapts to window size changes ### ⚡ Performance Features - **Optimized Circle Count**: Fewer circles on mobile devices - If reached target: set new random target 5. Draw circle at new position/size ``` #### 3. Responsive Logic ```typescript if (width < 640) → Mobile config else if (width < 1024) → Tablet config else → Desktop config ``` ### Data Structure ```typescript interface Circle { id: number; x: number; y: number; radius: number; color: string; velocityX: number; velocityY: number; targetRadius: number; radiusVelocity: number; } ``` ## 🎨 Color Palette ```typescript const COLORS = [ "rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.6)", // Pink "rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.6)", // Blue "rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.6)", // Yellow "rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)", // Teal "rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.6)", // Purple "rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.6)", // Orange "rgba(199, 199, 199, 0.6)", // Gray "rgba(83, 102, 255, 0.6)", // Indigo "rgba(255, 99, 255, 0.6)", // Magenta "rgba(99, 255, 132, 0.6)", // Green ]; ``` ## 📊 Component Stats - **Lines of Code**: ~220 (main component) - **Dependencies**: React only (no external packages) - **File Size**: ~5.2 KB (uncompressed) - **Props**: None (zero configuration) - **Exports**: 1 component - **Browser Support**: All modern browsers ## 🚀 Usage Examples ### Basic ```tsx ``` ### With Content ```tsx
